description: Manage retention policy for Azure Container Registries.

commands.name: az acr config retention show
commands.summary: Show the configured retention policy for an Azure Container Registry.
examples: az acr config retention show -r myregistry

commands.name: az acr config retention update
commands.summary: Update retention policy for an Azure Container Registry.
commands.syntax:
az acr config retention update --registry
                               --type {UntaggedManifests}
                               [--days]
                               [--resource-group]
                               [--status {disabled, enabled}]
examples: az acr config retention update -r myregistry --status Enabled --days 30 --type UntaggedManifests
az acr config retention update -r myregistry --status Enabled --days 0 --type UntaggedManifests
